column1: Little Goat Diner////Our server was Sean
column4: helpful.  Huge thumbs up!  We ordered a lot for three people:  waffles and chicken
column5: omelet of the day (crab ragoon version----yep!)
column8: and sausages.  Ohhhh... plus a cinnamon roll.  You are now thinking what I am thinking....I will not be eating again for a week.  Everything was quite good.  Breakfast cocktails were adequate but not amazing.  My daughter loved her hot chocolate
column9: which was served with a lovely swirl on top.
